name: Thief
trait: Backstab: Single-target attacks you make deal +1 damage.
heroAction:
Trickery:
• Steal – Roll target’s die; resolve it as if you rolled it.
• Vanish – Become untargetable until your next turn.
• Sabotage – Remove 1 Armor or 1 positive buff from a target.

name: Judge
trait: Retribution: When you take damage, the attacker suffers 1 damage.
heroAction:
Judgment Call:
• Reroll – Reroll your die.
• Condemn – Double the next damage you deal to one enemy.
• Balance – Either deal 1, heal 1, or grant 1 Armor.

name: Tank
trait: Bulwark: Reduce all incoming damage by 1 (minimum 0).
heroAction:
Hold the Line:
• Taunt – Enemies target you until your next turn.
• Fortify – Gain 3 Armor.
• Intercept – Prevent the next 2 damage to an ally.

name: Vampire
trait: Thirst: When you deal damage, heal 1 (once per roll).
heroAction:
Blood Arts:
• Drain – Deal 2 damage and heal 2.
• Charm – 50%: enemy skips next action.
• Bat Form – Untargetable; your next attack bypasses Armor.

name: King
trait: Royal Decree: Allies gain +1 to their first roll each round.
heroAction:
Command:
• Rally – All allies gain 1 Armor.
• Advance – Choose an ally; they roll immediately.
• Edict – Remove 1 debuff from all allies.

name: Wizard
trait: Arcane Focus: Your spell damage ignores 1 Armor.
heroAction:
Mystic Prep:
• Channel – Your next spell this turn deals +2 damage.
• Blink – Evade the next instance of damage.
• Scry – Peek at top of the encounter deck (or reroll).

name: Ranger
trait: Hunter’s Mark: The first enemy you hit each round takes +1 damage.
heroAction:
Fieldcraft:
• Mark – Mark a target (you deal +1 damage to it until it dies).
• Quickshot – Deal 1 damage to two different targets.
• Camouflage – Gain 2 Armor and become hard to target.

name: Cleric
trait: Sanctuary: The first time an ally would drop to 0 HP each combat, set them to 1 HP instead.
heroAction:
Divine Aid:
• Mend – Heal 3 split among allies.
• Ward – Grant 2 Armor to an ally.
• Purify – Remove all poison/bomb stacks from an ally.

name: Berserker
trait: Rage: While at or below half HP, your attacks deal +1 damage.
heroAction:
Fury:
• Reckless Swing – Deal 3 to an enemy and 1 to yourself.
• Roar – Enemies deal -1 damage until your next turn.
• Enrage – Take 1 damage to gain +2 damage on your next attack.

name: Paladin
trait: Oath: When you grant Armor to an ally, heal them 1.
heroAction:
Sacred Duty:
• Smite – Deal 2 damage that bypasses Armor.
• Aegis – Grant 2 Armor to an ally; you gain 1 Armor.
• Lay on Hands – Heal an ally 3.

name: Necromancer
trait: Grave Pact: When an enemy dies, gain 1 temporary HP (max +3).
heroAction:
Dark Arts:
• Rot – Apply 2 Poison to a target.
• Raise – Summon a fragile minion that absorbs the next 2 damage to you.
• Harvest – Deal 1 damage to all enemies; heal 1.

name: Bard
trait: Inspiration: The first ally to roll after you gets advantage (reroll once).
heroAction:
Performance:
• Valor – An ally’s next damage is +2.
• Lullaby – 50%: target enemy loses its next action.
• Crescendo – All allies gain 1 Armor.

name: Monk
trait: Flow: After you dodge damage, your next attack deals +2.
heroAction:
Discipline:
• Palm – Deal 2 and apply Disarm (-1 damage) to a target.
• Step – Become untargetable until your next turn.
• Breathe – Cleanse 1 debuff from yourself; gain 1 Armor.

name: Druid
trait: Wildheart: When you heal an ally, give them 1 Armor.
heroAction:
Shapeshift:
• Bear – Gain 3 Armor; your next attack deals +1.
• Falcon – Your next attack targets an additional enemy.
• Grove – Heal all allies 1.

name: Assassin
trait: Shadowstep: If you haven’t taken damage since your last turn, your first attack this turn bypasses Armor.
heroAction:
Kill Chain:
• Marked – Your next hit deals +2 against a single target.
• Smoke – You become untargetable; remove 1 debuff.
• Cut – Deal 1 damage; if the target is below half HP, deal +1.

name: Warlock
trait: Pact Boon: When you apply a debuff, gain 1 temporary HP (max +3).
heroAction:
Eldritch Arts:
• Hex – Target takes +1 damage from all sources until your next turn.
• Leech – Deal 2 and heal 1.
• Blink Curse – Next time target attacks, it deals -2 damage.

name: Sorcerer
trait: Surge: When you roll Upgrade, also gain +1 damage on your next spell.
heroAction:
Metamagic:
• Empower – Your next spell this turn deals +2.
• Twin – Your next single-target spell hits a second target.
• Shield – Prevent the next 2 damage to yourself.

name: Knight
trait: Guard: The first attack against an adjacent ally each round deals -1 damage.
heroAction:
Chivalry:
• Challenge – Force a target to attack you next.
• Shield Bash – Deal 1 and Stagger (target’s next roll has -1).
• Brace – Gain 2 Armor; if you already have Armor, gain +1 extra.
